title: Yasuo counter mordekais HARD.
body: Even against tahm I've never had a game that bad with the dark lord. I wanted to cry.

replies.body: It's generally considered that Morde counters Yasuo.
Bad yasuo maybe... Anyone with tons of mobility counters our beloved revenant. Dodging qs with the dash and whatnot. Maybe idk how to counter him but oh my God he was aggressive.
